Mindfulness Vase: A vase that doubles as a meditation tool, featuring a built-in timer and guided meditation tracks to help users focus and relax their minds.
Scented Vase: A vase that releases a fragrance as the water inside evaporates, providing a calming and soothing atmosphere in any room.
Light-Up Vase: A vase that glows with a soft, gentle light, creating a warm and inviting ambiance in the dark.
Music-Playing Vase: A vase that plays music when water is added, featuring a built-in speaker and a playlist of calming tunes to help users relax.
Interactive Vase: A vase that responds to voice commands, allowing users to control its lighting, music, or fragrance with just their voice, creating a futuristic and innovative home decor item.
